Package game

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    LevelFactory
    This is the interface for the Level factory.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Ball
    This is the ball which is launched around in the game.
    Consts
    This is where constants and variable globals are saved for organizing.
    CreateLevel
    This is where the level is created.
    Entity
    This is the abstract class for Entity.
    ExplosionBot
    This class represents a robot which explodes when it dies.
    GameController
    GameController manages gameplay by keeping track of keyboard and mouse input as well as recognizing and driving game state changes.
    GameMenuPage
    Class of GameMenuPage used to return back to main menu or exit game after the game has been played.
    GamePage
    GamePage represents the GamePage view from the MainPage.
    GameSpec
    GameSpec represents specs for a new game that is created.
    Grid
    Class of grid is used to keep track of all obstructions in the world.
    Hole
    This represents the specifications of the Hole for the game.
    InstructionPage
    This page represents the InstructionPage page to be used from MainPage.
    Level
    This class represents a level in the game.
    Main
    This is the main class where everything starts.
    MainPage
    MainPage represents all the Jframe information that displays on the MainPage view.
    Mob
    This is the mob class that defines the robots as far as rendering and physics.
    Obstruction
    This is Obstruction class for types of obstructions to Mob movement
    QuickplayPage
    QuickPlayPage represents the quick play button from Main page.
    SoundRepository
    This class represents the sound repository for the game.
    StandardBot
    This class represents the standard robot settings along with extending the Mob class.
    Utils
    Adapted from http://www.iforce2d.net/b2dtut/explosions Applies an impulse to a jBox2d Body inversely proportional to its distance away, to simulate something similar to an explosion.
    UtilsTest  
    View
    This class represents the abstract class of View.
    Wall
    This class represents specifications of Wall.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    GameState
    GameState represents the states of the game.
